titleStmt.title: The unequal match, or, The life of Mary of Anjou Queen of Majorca Part 1. an historical novel.
titleStmt.author: La Chapelle, M. de (Jean), 1655-1723.
Spence, Ferrand.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Charles Blount ... and Richard Butt ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
Translation of the author's Marie d'Anjou, reigne de Maiorque, nouvelle historique et galante.
